attributes.action: Debate FA cup replays and force the FA and Premier League to change their mind .
attributes.additional_details: This is the only way to get this petition noticed .
attributes.background: Force the FA and premier league to reinstate fa cup replays.

rejection.details:
Not the Government/Parliament’s responsibility

We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about arrangements for football matches and tournaments are a matter for the football authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
